TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1027
TEI.2.document_title: James A. E. Phelos to Stephen F. Austin, 01-29-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: James A. E. Phelps to Austin, January 29, 1825. Sends garden seed.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1027

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James A. E. Phelps to Austin, January 29, 1825. Sends garden seed.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Pinckney ville [Mississipi]*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-29-1825">Jan. 29th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned* Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir.*/p* *p*I have the oportunity of complying with my promise to send you some Garden seeds by *person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* I hope they will be to your liking. On the *date_mentioned n="01-18-1825">18th*/date_mentioned* Inst I wrote you by Mail; I hope you have Received the same—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James A. E. Phelps*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
